title: SCOTUS Leak Proves the Left Wants Chaos | Guests: Kelly Shackleford & Sen. Mike Lee | 5/3/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the unprecedented Supreme Court leak that suggests Roe v. Wade will be overturned entirely. The Left is already calling for the most radical moves to keep abortion legal everywhere. Glenn goes through the different states' abortion laws. Pat Gray joins to discuss the Left's meltdown over Roe v. Wade potentially being overturned. President and CEO of First Liberty Institute Kelly Shackleford joins to give some insight on the Supreme Court leak and what this will mean for the country. Sen. Roger Marshall joins to discuss the Supreme Court leak and the horrors of abortion. Sen. Mike Lee discusses the Supreme Court leak and Roe v. Wade. Glenn and Stu discuss the possible aftermath of Roe v. Wade being overturned.
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
